tagline.text: Enthusiastic & passionate about sports, photography, software-engineering and all kinds of sophisticated stuff

about.headline: About this portfolio
about.text: This portfolio should simply provide a few links and information about my professional and private content that I love to share!

photography.headline: Photography
photography.text: My photo blog collects some of my photo albums that I collected during my time as a amateur photographer. I started out as a photographer for the Nord West Cycling Team (nw-ct.de) and went on to collect impressions of some beautiful countries during my (hiking) holidays!

platforms.linkedin: My professional qualifications, employee information and companies I am interested in.
platforms.github: Some old university projects and attempts to contribute to open source projects. But still looking for a workplace and the time/energy to give something back to the open source magic!
platforms.twitter: Not very active, but sometimes you can have a glance at my humor, my interests about tech and stuff that fascinates me.
platforms.stackoverflow: My developer story displayed by stackoverflow's feature. Containing some overview about my recent education, projects and employers.

contact.slogan: That's about it... enjoy the view!
contact.instagram:
>No selfies, boomerangs or filters.

Just trying to capture some beautiful nature or city impressions, which seemed to be nice to share!
contact.thanks-text:
To the creator of this wonderful single page template. It was a pleasure to modify and work on it.

Credit goes to David Miller and his contributors on his Github repo
